thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com
thread.title: Melissa gabrielli

author: Melissa gabrielli
title: Melissa gabrielli
text: Best experience ever! Staff is wonderful! from the moment I walked into the door to the moment I walk out with 100% professional, reassuring, and just all-around a great experience! I was very very very nervous when I walked in the door by the time I left I was smiling and excited ! I was there to have a old tattoo removed and have experienced laser tattoo removal in the past and it was not a good experience for me! Laser away made my experience 100% better and I'm happy to say that I can go through with it !!!
